intent_atoms.description: Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow introduced in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection.md
The ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests must pass on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support, confirming the SwiftUI automation flow works end-to-end.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
The Combine-backed UI benchmark must run on macOS and produce latency metrics that match throughput parity with the CLI harness.
